1rapmon 158370080811 "2017-03-13 23:00:48 GMT" http://1rapmon.tumblr.com/post/158370080811/hey-did-you-know-that-you-can-buy-me-a-pretend "uziregar:  uziregar:  uziregar: it’s like a tip jar?? i am but a humble busker sitting by the roadside spinning my awkwardly erotic tales and you really don’t want your mom knowing that you hang out on my block but you still drop a couple bucks in the hat every once in a while i feel shitty about this but i actually could really use some help. this is a really easy way to give me a few dollars - a “coffee” is only $3 and if you want to give more you can
column2: by upping the number of coffees. $3 isn’t a lot of money but if a bunch of people chip in $3 it builds up pretty fast. if even a quarter of my followers chip in the absolute minimum i’d be set for almost three months
column3: and i’ll be spending everything on medical expenses and necessary survival living expenses. so if you read and enjoy my fic
column4: or think i’m funny sometimes on tumblr
column5: or derive amusement from my lack of understanding about the inner workings of twitter AND you have three bucks kicking around that isn’t reserved… well
column7: it’s your money. but i selfishly hope that you’d decide to spend it on me and my continued ability to stay alive and like write and stuff. and if you could reblog? i have more user subscribers on ao3 than i have followers here which means i might have readers on tumblr that just don’t know that i’m here too
column8: and they might want to know about it. TT_____TT thank you i’m updating yh1nm really soon and it’s a really big
column9: happy chapter :)  i apologize for bringing this back but i went to the doctor on wednesday and will need a lot more tests that may not be very well covered by my insurance (ultrasounds
column12: if you have $3 and you’ve enjoyed my work - you have 1 new message
column16: a midnight clear - please consider helping me out. the site hasn’t worked for everybody so if you’d prefer some other way of helping me out here’s my paypal link ><;;; i’m sorry " False link
